entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 early this morning then becoming light this afternoon. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
